alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued February 16 at 2:30PM CST until February 16 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CST FOR NORTHERN TISHOMINGO...NORTHEASTERN ALCORN AND SOUTHERN HARDIN COUNTIES... At 230 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Glen, or 7 miles southeast of Corinth, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... J P Coleman State Park, Glen, Walnut Grove, Pineflat, Farmington, Damon, Doskie, Kendrick, Strickland, Pollards Mill, Winn Springs and Red Sulphur Springs. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
